excerpt: If you're about when to expect the spoilers for Blue Lock Chapter 289 to come out, here's the estimated release window for the leaks.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: The readers of the Blue Lock manga are wondering when the spoilers for Chapter 289 will come out, as Yukimiya Kenyu has finally entered the play. Till now, fans witnessed events like Gurimu getting subbed out. Moreover, Kenyu takes his place as the left midfielder for Bastard Munchen. Here is when fans can expect the leaks of Blue Lock Chapter 289 to be released so that readers can learn more about what transpires next. When to expect Blue Lock Chapter 289 spoilers? The spoilers of Blue Lock Chapter 289 are expected to hit online platforms between Saturday, January 4, and Monday, January 6, 2024. The next chapter Blue Lock is set to go out on Tuesday, January 7, 2024, in the United States. It will release the following day in Japan on Wednesday, January 8. Hence, based on this pattern, the spoilers will likely arrive in the aforementioned period. Here are the time slots at which the chapter will be available: 8 AM PT 11 AM ET 10 AM CT 4 PM BST Blue Lock Chapter 288 spoilers recap After a one-week break, Chapter 289 of the Blue Lock manga is set to release and fans are eager for a glimpse at what would happen in it. Meanwhile, Chapter 288 largely focuses on the inclusion of Yukimiya Kenyu in Bastard Munchen and Paris X Gen’s game. With Gurimu’s exit from the clash, Noel Noa brings Kenyu to the game to enhance the attack of Bastard Munchen. As the game is approaching its conclusion, both teams are eager to make a goal. Upon entering the match, Kenyu receives a pass from Gagamaru Gin. Thus, he uses his dribbling tactics to coordinate with Isagi and Kaiser. However, what looks like the perfect coordination, ends as it was actually Kenyu’s plan to use Isagi to get closer to the goal. This move by the substitute catches Isagi off-guard, while Kenyu attempts a solo goal.
html:
The readers of the Blue Lock manga are wondering when the spoilers for Chapter 289 will come out, as Yukimiya Kenyu has finally entered the play. Till now, fans witnessed events like Gurimu getting subbed out. Moreover, Kenyu takes his place as the left midfielder for Bastard Munchen.

Here is when fans can expect the leaks of Blue Lock Chapter 289 to be released so that readers can learn more about what transpires next.

When to expect Blue Lock Chapter 289 spoilers?

The spoilers of Blue Lock Chapter 289 are expected to hit online platforms between Saturday, January 4, and Monday, January 6, 2024.

The next chapter Blue Lock is set to go out on Tuesday, January 7, 2024, in the United States. It will release the following day in Japan on Wednesday, January 8. Hence, based on this pattern, the spoilers will likely arrive in the aforementioned period.

Here are the time slots at which the chapter will be available:

  • 8 AM PT
  • 11 AM ET
  • 10 AM CT
  • 4 PM BST

Blue Lock Chapter 288 spoilers recap

After a one-week break, Chapter 289 of the Blue Lock manga is set to release and fans are eager for a glimpse at what would happen in it. Meanwhile, Chapter 288 largely focuses on the inclusion of Yukimiya Kenyu in Bastard Munchen and Paris X Gen’s game.

With Gurimu’s exit from the clash, Noel Noa brings Kenyu to the game to enhance the attack of Bastard Munchen. As the game is approaching its conclusion, both teams are eager to make a goal. Upon entering the match, Kenyu receives a pass from Gagamaru Gin. Thus, he uses his dribbling tactics to coordinate with Isagi and Kaiser.

However, what looks like the perfect coordination, ends as it was actually Kenyu’s plan to use Isagi to get closer to the goal. This move by the substitute catches Isagi off-guard, while Kenyu attempts a solo goal.
